name: Cybersecurity
samplePrompt: Generate an incident response summary using the selected context.

chunks.title: Threat Vector
chunks.body: Credential stuffing detected on public endpoints.

chunks.title: Indicators
chunks.body: Anomalous IP clusters, repeated login failures, unexpected token refresh calls.

chunks.title: Containment
chunks.body: Rate limits tightened, reCAPTCHA enabled, forced password resets for affected users.

chunks.title: Eradication
chunks.body: WAF rules updated, source IPs blocked, compromised tokens revoked.

chunks.title: Lessons Learned
chunks.body: Add 2FA enforcement, periodic credential hygiene campaigns, detection rule tuning.
